twitter.description: "Houston, we've had a problem." The near-disaster of Apollo 13 left the world with a famous phrase (slightly misremembered), many lessons from the bravery and later a Hollywood movie. Today in WSJ History, April 15, 1970.
twitter.title: April 15, 1970: Apollo 13
